EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The product for which you inquired is from our Raychem/TE Connectivity Energy and Utility division. For information on these products, you will find the contact information for your area at the following link http://www.te.com/us/en/industries/energy/ContactUs.aspx . You can also view their products at http://www.te.com/us/en/industries/energy/home.aspx
Thank you for your inquiry, TE Connectivity Technical Support Center http://www.te.com For Support: http://www.te.com/help 800-522-6752 x2
Users of TE products should make their own evaluation of the information / data provided to determine the suitability of each such product for the specific application.
